summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of 32nd Avenue North and 33rd Avenue North, each from East Madison Street to East Mercer Street, and East Mercer Street from 32nd Avenue North to 33rd Avenue North, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks, concrete stairways, cross walks, and providing for the necessary surface drainage, all in accordance with Resolution No. 2791 of the city council of the City of Seattle; and providing payment therefor by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle.
